About Me

Let me tell you about a few things...

A highly focused and self-motivated JavaScript Developer with seven years’ experience in a variety of technical and engineering positions. During this period, I have gained many transferable skills, with a good understanding of a wide range of programming languages. Experience within Technical Operations has enabled me to gain a greater understanding and additional depth to approaching system development and architecture with scalability, adaptability and reliability. A methodical thinker with good problem-solving skills and high standards, achieving reliable, neat and concise coding, adhering to convention and standards. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills allow me to build lasting working relationships with clients, senior management and colleagues. These skills also help analyse and capture client requirements to report and present these findings to the development teams and project managers in a technical or non-technical manner.

Flashtalking - Technical Operations

Technical Operations Specialist

Applications support . Monitoring and Outage management including the use of OpsGenie, Catchpoint, AppMonitor and Graylog. Release engineering including the use of Bitbucket, Git, Jenkins. System engineering including the use of Nagios, AWS, Racks and DYN. Individual on-call responsibility for the entire company on a rotational basis. Organise and execute maintenance windows for hardware or software failures. Communicating with external clients to debug and trouble shoot hardware failures. Ensuring maintenance or outage windows are completed with Project Manager and Business approval/knowledge.

Flashtalking - Creative Technology Service Desk Team Leader

JavaScript Specialist – Mobile Team Technical Support

New position and platform created from my experience as Sitefix Team Lead. I suggested an additional team to be created to handle more serious live tag issues as well as Identifying and troubleshooting system bugs without involving the Development teams. Providing technical support for all front-line staff. JIRA used for issue and feature request tracking with Kanban boards and queues. Constant communication with product owners, product managers and technical leads ensuring understanding for both Technical and Non -Technical clients/colleagues. Further development of varied languages including PHP, AJAX, HTML 5, JavaScript, CSS3 and React. Integration with SDKs using MRAID and ORMMA.

Flashtalking - Sitefix Team Leader

JavaScript Specialist - Support Desk

Promoted to Team Leader, managing a small team. Responsible for leading staff training in other branches for technical and non-technical colleagues. Ensuring ticket deadlines were met and exceeded by myself and the team. Further communication with external clients. Further development in JavaScript, HTML 5, JIRA and CSS

Flashtalking - Sitefix Team

JavaScript Specialist - Support Desk

Excellent communication with internal and external clients. Competent use of JavaScript, JIRA HTML 5 AND CSS. Achieving and exceeding timescales, adhering to SLA, achieving 95/100%. Troubleshoot trafficked tags with custom JavaScript and/or HTML extensions. Create custom templates and site rules using JavaScript and HTML 5. JIRA used for issue tracking with Kanban boards and queues.

RAF Leeming

Web Applications Developer

Develop high spec web applications using PHP, JavaScript and ASP.net. Capturing customer requirements. Continue to improve wed development knowledge. Time and self-management

Sheffield Hallum University
